summary: This mod allows you to remove spells from a player when you press hotkey.
descriptionHtml:
TES 5 Skyrim \" Spell Deletion for Skyrim \" v.1.2 

Author: Demolir 
Category: Magic / Miscellaneous
Requirement: Skyrim v.1.8.151. SKSE v.1.6.4 + 

Description: Many probably used in TES 4 Oblivion such famous mod as \" Spell Deletion \", which allows you to remove any unnecessary over spell from the magic menu. This mod is to be adapted for TES 5 Skyrim. It works much the same as its predecessor - choose the unnecessary spell and press a key. And the spell is gone! The default hotkey is fixed to \" Delete \", but you can override it. To do this in the game, press \" Insert \", then the key to delete (but not both). The message \" Hotkey reset / set. \" 

So spells are removed in the order:

1. You open the magic menu
2. Click on the spell to delete (that is, equip the spell)
3. Close the menu
4. Click the \"delete spell\" key
5. Done!

Note: Spells are removed in game mode, but not in the menu. Removed as a single spell, and with both hands. Talents and shouts are not removed, the spell of the other plug-ins are supported. Spells that are added when the character generation (\" Healing \", \" Flames \") are not deleted, but only dropped. 

Installation: - Copy the contents of the archive into Skyrim folder.
                 - Connect esp in SkyrimLauncher

Russian Version http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27693/
author: Demolir
